attributes.action: Stop the NHS physiotherapy jobs crisis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Find jobs for graduates who have been trained with your government's money. With more than 80% of UK graduates of 2006 being unemployed as physiotherapists, something has to be done.

Provide better management of funding in order to put a stop to jobs freezes. These make career development almost impossible, and are causing major under-staffing which contributes hugely to large waiting lists, and additional pressure on staff.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the NHS physiotherapy jobs crisis."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15352.asp

Prime Minister's Office
